name: Asteroids (itch) (x00F)
description:
Shoot the asteroids to avoid them crashing into your ship. Try to get the highest score you can, but be careful, you only have 3 lives!

NOTE: PC Only

Key binds:

Thrust: W

Spin: A & D

Shoot: Spacebar / Left Mouse Button
